titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd before the Society for Reformation of Manners; on Easter-Tuesday, at Kingston upon Thames, 1700. By Gideon Harding, M.A. vicar of Kingston upon Thames
titleStmt.author: Hardinge, G. (Gideon), d. 1713.
Societies for the Reformation of Manners.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Tho. Parkhurst, at the Bible and Three Crowns near Mercers-Chappel in Cheapside,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A sermon for the reformation of manners.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
